With OneKey, security and usability can certainly go hand in hand
Your assets, only in your hands
Our servers do not store your private key or mnemonic in any way, and the software and hardware are open source, so feel free to use them.
By beginning use, you agree to OneKey\'s User Agreement
We use industry-leading encryption technology to store information locally. Only you can decrypt the information and we do not and cannot view, use or sell any of your data.
Only you can unlock your wallet
It is used to encrypt your wallet, is easy to remember, and works for most people
Do not share your password with anyone
We do not store any of your information, so if you forget your long password, we cannot help you retrieve it.
Complex passwords are relatively more secure, so keep that in mind after you set them, and don\'t set them the same as your other site passwords
We do not store any of your information, so if you forget your password, we cannot help you retrieve it.
Privacy Policy, Usage Agreement, and Open Source Software.
Once imported, mnemonic is encrypted and stored on your local device for safekeeping. OneKey does not store any private data and cannot retrieve it for you.
- Don\'t uninstall the OneKey App so easily
- Don\'t give out mnemonics to anyone
- Do not take screenshots or transmit the above sensitive information via chat tools, etc.
HD wallets only support mnemonic and hardware wallet recovery, if you want to import a single currency regular wallet, please import from the generic portal.
Enter the private key or scan its QR code (Case Sensitive)
Enter the private key or scan its QR code
Once imported, the private key is encrypted and stored on your local device for safekeeping. OneKey does not store any private data and cannot retrieve it for you.
Copy and paste the contents of the Keystore file, or import it by scanning the Keystore QR code
Once imported, the private key in the Keystore is encrypted and stored on your local device for safekeeping. OneKey does not store any private data and cannot retrieve it for you.
Please enter the address or public key, support xPub, or scan the QR code to import

Observation Wallet does not require importing a private key or mnemonic, only an address or public key, which you can use to track daily transaction history or receive notifications of incoming and outgoing coins.
Please enter the transfer out amount

All child wallets derived from the HD wallet root mnemonic can be recovered with the root mnemonic with one click, so there is no need to export the individual wallet\'s mnemonic. If you want to get the root mnemonic of a HD wallet, please go to My → Asset → HD Wallet and do so.
Turn on your device and get close to your phone.
Prepare a new hardware wallet that has been activated
Prepare a new, inactive hardware wallet
🎉 Discover a new device You can...
Suitable for most first-time users of hardware wallets
Import your assets in other wallets
Restore this device from phone backup
For users who previously stored encrypted backup information on their phones
Requires at least 2 devices and currently only works with BTC wallets.
Set your 6-digit password according to the PIN location displayed on the device
Be prepared to write down your seed phrases
Hate to write down seed phrases?
Back up to another hardware wallet (Advanced) ->
The keypad on your phone changes randomly each time, and it is important to remember that PIN cannot be recovered if you forget them.
Find the following backup in your phone
🔑 This device is activated and you can...
Create as many as you need with no limit.
If you have ever deleted a wallet on your phone that was created by that device, you can use this method to recover it.
Clone it to another new device
If you have multiple hardware devices, you can use this method to achieve multiple backup purposes
🔑 This is a special device that stores HD wallet helper words that you can...
Complete recovery of your HD wallet, any wallet derived from the original HD mnemonic will be recovered.

A device with a backed up HD wallet will only be used to restore the HD wallet you created on the App. If you wish to use more features of this device, you can restore the device to factory mode after taking care of the HD wallet\'s helper (manually transcribing it) and then re-pair and activate the device to use it as a regular hardware wallet.
Select the assets to be added
1. All HD wallets will be erased.
2. Please make sure that the root mnemonic of the HD wallet is copied and stored before you delete it, you can use it to recover all HD wallets and thus retrieve the assets.
Based on HD root mnemonic derivation (recommended)

Do not need to copy mnemonic. With the HD label, it is derived from the wallet root mnemonic (the mnemonic phrase you copied when you first created the wallet). It is an implementation of the Bitcoin core protocol BIP44.
Separate wallet with separate private key generated by local encryption algorithm. Requires re-transcription of the helper word, and everything is not shared with the HD wallet.
Please enter address or public key
Mnemonic is used to recover assets in other apps or wallets by transcribing them in the correct order and placing them in a safe place that only you know.
Your password will be used to encrypt sensitive information，
And is used to validate at steps that require security checks.
After changing your password, your original biometrics (face, fingerprint) will be disabled and will need to be reset.
Price quotes (only affects the display of BTC and ETH prices)
Use your favorite browser to view on-chain transaction information
Use its open source distributed nodes for transaction broadcasting and on-chain information acquisition
Use a proxy server to hide network traces
Back up your wallet to keep your assets safe

If you don\'t back up your wallet, you will never be able to retrieve your assets if you lose your phone. In some extreme cases, the phone manufacturer may have an accident during a system upgrade that results in the loss of all your data or apps, with unforeseen consequences if you happen not to have a backup.
The only way to protect your assets is to do a proper backup.
Data being retrieved from hardware wallets
Data transfer takes some time, place your device next to your phone.
The helper words are being backed up to %s

Your mnemonic has been successfully backed up to this device, so we have nothing more to remind you. Anyway, remember to keep it safe, no one can help you get it back if you lose it. Have fun in the world of blockchain️.
This is an official OneKey product with built-in official firmware, so feel free to use it!
This device is not running official firmware and may have been tampered with. If this is not your own doing, please contact the seller to take action.
This is the final step to confirm the new PIN code on your device.
Alert, you have not backed up the seed phrase for this wallet. For the safety of your assets, please do not transfer crypto to this wallet until it\'s backed up.
Be prepared to copy down your mnemonics
OneKey™ uses advanced encryption algorithms and protocols. You only need to copy the mnemonic word* once, and you can create countless wallets, any currency, any number, once and for all.
In case your phone is lost or stolen, you can use the mnemonic to recover your entire wallet, get out a pen and paper, and let\'s get started.
Hate to write down seed phrases?
This action will delete all data of the wallet, please make sure the wallet is backed up before deleting.
Mastering the private data of the wallet is the same as mastering the assets of the wallet itself, please
1. Prepare paper and pen ready to copy carefully, please keep them in a safe place after confirming that they are correct.
2. Do not screenshot! Mobile photo albums are easily accessible by other applications.
3. OneKey does not store private data for you, and private data cannot be recovered if lost.
The original password was entered incorrectly
HD Wallet is Hierarchical Deterministic Wallet, known as 分层确定性钱包 in Chinese. It is by far the best and most convenient deterministic wallet available.

You have derived the following wallets using the HD mnemonic, select the one you want to recover. The wallets that you do not want to recover at the moment can be skipped and re-added later in the HD Wallet without losing your assets.
Selecting the right quote source \n only affects the price display of BTC and ETH.
Block Browser (BTC) \nUse your favorite browser to view the on chain transactions information
Please select the wallet you want to recover.
The following settings apply to bitcoin accounts with hardware wallets
Select the display language of the hardware wallet
Number of co-managers needed >= Number of signatures
Determine how many people are involved in wallet management
Refers to the number of signatures required to access the wallet\'s funds.
OneKey (including Bixin Limited Edition), or you can directly enter the public key to complete the binding.
The co-management wallet can only be activated after all participants have completed their bindings.
The co-owner can still participate in activating the co-owner wallet by providing public key.
Each time you use the funds in this wallet, you will need to

The wallet\'s private key or mnemonic is already securely stored in the hardware device. If you need to export the mnemonic for a hardware wallet, go to Mine →️ All Hardware to find the device you want to export it to.
Signature information does not match public key/original information
Check again to make sure that you have copied all the mnemonic, and that they are in the same order as the words.

Everything seems to be in place! \We don\'t have anything else to remind you. \Anyway, remember to keep your mnemonic safe, and no one can help you get it back if you lose it. \Have fun in the world of blockchain ❤️!
Selecting the Display Language of APP
Set the auto shutdown time to save power by automatically turning off the device when the time comes

After enabling quick payment, if a single transaction is less than the set limit, there is no need to verify the PIN or to confirm. After repeatedly using the Quick pay for a set number of times, the system will automatically close it.
No keystroke confirmation required on device
1. Your private key or mnemonic stored in this hardware wallet will be erased

2. The account you created in the OneKey App with this wallet still exists, but you cannot access the assets on it because you lack the private key. Unless you have previously backed up your mnemonic or private key, use them to restore the hardware wallet and regain control of the account.
The hardware wallet will disappear from your device list. The account you created with this hardware wallet will still display properly and will be re-paired and restored the next time you use it.
The password should not be longer than 34 characters, please re-fill.
The wallet created with this private key already exists!
Standard wallets do not support backup to hardware devices
Mnemonic are very sensitive and private, and if someone else gets access to them, you could lose all your assets, so don\'t take screenshots and be aware of the cameras in your neighborhood.
The name can be up to 15 characters.
Please back up your wallet before deleting.
1. The wallet will be removed from the App.
2. please make sure that before you delete the standard wallet, the seed phrase has been stored safely so that you can use it to restore the wallet and retrieve your assets.
This operation will delete all data in this wallet. In order to avoid damage to your property, please complete a backup of your wallet first.
You seem to have taken a screenshot just now.

Mobile photo albums are very insecure and can be accessed by any app. Immediately go to your phone album and delete the screenshot you just took permanently. In the future you will be thankful for your decision now.
Passwords should not be less than 8 characters long, and it is recommended to use highly complex passwords with a mix of upper and lower case letters, numbers, and special characters.

When the factory settings are restored: 1. your private key or passphrase stored in this hardware wallet will be erased; 2. the account you created with this wallet in the OneKey App will still exist, but you will not be able to access the assets on it because the private key is missing. Unless you have previously backed up the helper or private key, you can use it to restore the hardware wallet and regain control of the account.

The \"Extended Public Key\", also known as XPUB, is part of the Bitcoin Standard (BIP32) and does not contain any private key. \n\nThe Extended Public Key shown below is used when you create or join a condominium (multi-signature) wallet.

This will delete all data in the App, including the currently created wallet and custom settings. This action cannot be undone. Please be sure to make a backup of your wallet before deleting it in order to retrieve your assets.

The current version of OneKey\'s security chip is too low and does not support backup cards
For the safety of your BTC assets, you need to back up your OneKey Seed information before you can use OneKey to store your BTC assets.

OneKey private key seeds can be backed up in the following ways: 
 1. Back up the seeds encrypted to your phone, and you can use the backup file to restore OneKey at any time 
 2. Import the seeds to a new OneKey, and you will get two OneKeys with identical seeds 
 3. Back up the seeds to OneKey Lite, and restore them from OneKey Lite when you need them
Setting the PIN for OneKey Lite
